name: Rabbit Dream
description:
Rabbit Dream "In a very far away city, in a very far away universe, there was a story about a white rabbit who wanted to help sad humans to find happiness.  Whatever it cost. First part of the Rabbit Moon series." Rabbit from Rabbit Dream by Yeray Toledano, Game Designer

 Audiovisual communication Graduated, making some games and having fun! I love pixel art, vaporwave and pastel colors.

Made with Unity 2017, all the graphics are made by me with Photoshop.

The second part of this game: Rabbit Jump (2018)

You can contact me with my Twitter, Linkedin or Twitch!
